#summary ModSL diagram language syntax

=== Overview ===
Currently ModSL supports a subset of the UML class and collaboration diagram.

=== Class Diagram ===
Sample:
{{{
class diagram MyDiagram (width:640, height:480) { 
   interface MyInterface { 
      method1(); 
   } 
   class MyClass1 implements MyInterface { 
      var1; var2; method1(); method2(); 
   }
   class MyClass2 implements MyInterface { 
      method1();
      1->0..n(MyClass1);
   }	
} 
}}}

Some notes:
   * The word "diagram" in the diagram definition is optional.
   * Width and height are optional. Without width and height specified the layout algorithm will try to determine the best diagram size based on the number of nodes and edges.
